library.description: there are many different types of books

books.title: Python Programming
books.author: john
books.preface: the most programming language used in AI

chapters.title: Ch1: basics
chapters.summary: An overview of fundamental programming concepts, including variables, data types, and control structures.

sections.title: Sec 1.1: variables and datatypes
content: Variables are used to store data in programming.
Different data types include integers, strings, and booleans.

sections.title: Sec 1.2: control statements
content: Control structures include loops and conditional statements.
They help in decision-making and repeating tasks efficiently.

chapters.title: Ch2: OOP
chapters.summary: A detailed explanation of OOP principles such as encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.

sections.title: Sec 2.1: Encapsulation
content: Encapsulation is the bundling of data and methods that operate on that data.
It helps in protecting the internal state of an object.

sections.title: Sec 2.2: Inheritance
content: Help us not repeat the data and take the attributes form parent.

chapters.title: Ch3: Design Patterns
chapters.summary: Explores common design patterns used in software development.

sections.title: Sec 3.1: Singleton
content: The Singleton pattern ensures that a class has only one instance.
It is useful for managing shared resources like database connections.
